titles.title: GPS Act
Geospatial Partnership for Security Act of 2020
GPS Act
To authorize appropriations to the National Geospatial-Intelligence Agency to provide support for commercial geospatial, open source, and emerging space companies, and for other purposes.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Intelligence (Permanent Select).

bill.summary:
Geospatial Partnership for Security Act of 2020 or the GPS Act
This bill authorizes for FY2021 National Geospatial-Intelligence Agency activities to partner with and provide support to commercial geospatial, open source, and emerging space companies.
